name: Shrimp Scampi
steps:
Cook linguine according to package directions.
Heat butter and olive oil in a large pan.
Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes, cook for 1 minute.
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side.
Add white wine and lemon juice, simmer for 2 minutes.
Toss with cooked linguine.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve immediately.
